EmailTemplate.description: License Email for Aspire License Products
EmailTemplate.name: AspireLicenseEmailHtml
EmailTemplate.subject: ASPIRE LICENSE KEYS for your order #: {!Apttus_Config2__Order__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear customer ,
Thank you for choosing Honeywell. We are pleased to be of service!
ASPIRE LICENSE KEYS RECEIVED for your order # : {!Apttus_Config2__Order__c.Name}
Please Click Here to navigate to "Aspire - My Licenses" in ASDS to download Aspire 400 licenses.
If you would like to contact us for any help, please send us an email at: dsa@honeywell.com or call us on 1-602-436-6738 (International)
Thank You, Customer Services Honeywell International Please note that this is an automated email, kindly do not revert back.
